5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Jubair bin Mut’im said:“The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: ‘O Banu ‘Abd Manaf! Do not prevent anyone from circumambulating this House or praying at any time he wants of the day or night.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الرُّخْصَةِ فِي الصَّلاَةِ بِمَكَّةَ فِي كُلِّ وَقْتٍ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning the concession allowing Prayer in Makkah at any time
